title: Chapter VI - Communications Of The Division Of Taxation Of The Department Of Taxation And Finance
content:
Chapter VI - Communications Of The Division Of Taxation Of The Department Of Taxation And Finance

State Regulations

Part 2375 - Communicating Tax Policy And Interpretations (ยง 2375.1 to 2375.12)

Part 2376 - Advisory Opinions Of The Commissioner Of Taxation And Finance (ยง 2376.1 to 2376.5)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
